name: Bear Vs Hunter
description:
Play as a bear and fight the hunters that want your head on their chimney.

Use cover to dodge bullets and sneak behind your enemies to defeat them.
Survive against hunters and their fellow hunting dogs by exploiding their weaknesses.

Try yourself in challenging levels against coordinated huntergroups,
Survive against endless amounts of hunters, or hunt each other in the versusmode.

Features
  • 3 Challenge-stages with 7 levels
  • Many different enemy types
  • Survivalmode
  • Versusmode
  • 1-4 Players
